fields.description:
After the script has been updated to allow Windows targets we should try and work it into titanium_mobile_windows build process, I imagine the process will look something like this

# Add a stage to check out the mocha-suite
# Copy across any new tests from a folder we designate as the temp dir
# Edit the current test script to execute from the mocha-suite dir

There's going to be a ton of roadblocks in this I imagine


H5.References

https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/Jenkinsfile
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/blob/66ccc0a080360d147dd2b59c748a075b87107233/Tools/Scripts/build/test.js
fields.summary: Add titanium-mobile-mocha-suite into the titanium_mobile_windows build process
